ai-tha-ap295:1.1_0: I had gone forth from the household
ai-tha-ap295:1.2_0: then it was running out of desire.
ai-tha-ap295:1.3_0: for a Buddha awakened for themselves,
ai-tha-ap295:2.3_0: the great hermit is the greatest of all,
ai-tha-ap295:3.1_0: there a raised my joined palms to him:
ai-tha-ap295:3.3_0: The top of a sleeping place
ai-tha-ap295:3.4_0: I announce to all, then I announce this to you:
ai-tha-ap295:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap295:4.2_0: and having this six psychic powers,
ai-tha-ap295:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap295:4.4_0: this is the fruit of giving.
ai-tha-ap295:5.1_0: twenty eons after the left of the world.
ai-tha-ap295:5.3_0: You’re worthy of such a kind,
ai-tha-ap295:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Six.
